page.description: Get or Set the value of a custom setting.

argument.name: UXControlCustomSettingName
argument.description: The custom setting to get or set. Custom setting names are case sensitive.

argument.name: value
argument.description: Optional. Required if you want to set the value of the custom setting. If defined, sets the value of the custom setting.

page.discussion: Custom settings are defined in the *[ui:Properties]* pane of the UX Builder.
